title: New: Julia Jaye – Traffic Lights
body:
I can honestly say this is the first time I’ve ever stumbled across [Air BnB](https://www.

airbnb.co.uk/users/show/121207) listings when trying to find out more information on a musician. Aside from apparently being a cracking host, LA’s **Julia Jaye** has a great voice, as shown on her newest track, _Traffic Lights_. Featuring some rather impeccable production, it evolves into a gloriously over the top dream-pop number; a hugely enjoyable listen.
